se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.analyzer.patterns

Class DefaultTopReactorPatterns

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.analyzer.patterns.AbstractMavenModelPatterns
      • se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.analyzer.patterns.DefaultTopReactorPatterns
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MavenModelPatterns

    public class DefaultTopReactorPatterns
extends AbstractMavenModelPatterns

    Default MavenModelPatterns implementation for a top-level reactor POM, typically on the following form:

         <parent>
          <groupId>se.jguru.nazgul.tools.poms.external</groupId>
          <artifactId>nazgul-tools-external-reactor-parent</artifactId>
     </parent>

      <groupId>com.acme.foobar</groupId>
      <artifactId>foobar-reactor</artifactId>
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Pattern ARTIFACT_ID_PATTERN
      Required pattern for artifactIDs within top-level reactor POMs.
      static Pattern PARENT_ARTIFACT_ID_PATTERN
      The pattern for parent's artifactIDs within top-level reactor POMs.
      static Pattern PARENT_GROUP_ID_PATTERN
      The pattern for parent's groupIDs within top-level reactor POMs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultTopReactorPatterns()
      Default constructor, passing all defined patterns to its superclass.
